text: The Fiat Tipo is a car produced by Fiat. It replaced the Fiat Ritmo in 1988, and was replaced by the Fiat Bravo and Brava in 1995. The Tipo name returned in 2016 on an entirely new generation of small family cars. == Engines == * 1.1 41 kW (56 hp) * 1.4 52 kW (71 hp) * 1.4 i.e. 51 kW (69 hp) * 1.6 60 kW (82 hp) * 1.6 i.e. 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.8 i.e. 66 kW (90 hp) and 79 kW (107 hp) * 1.8 i.e. 16V 102 kW (139 hp) * 2.0 i.e. 83 kW (113 hp) * 2.0 i.e. 16V 102 kW (139 hp) and 107 kW (146 hp) Tipo Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles
title: Fiat Tipo
